transcript:
Executive: Ji, hello?

Customer: Hello sir, Namaste.

Executive: Namaste. Sir, actually, baat kar rahe the IndiaMART se. Sir, aapke against ek complaint aayi thi Yatish karke hai, unko ki phone shayad defective mila tha.

Customer: Kya complaint aayi, ma'am?

Executive: Yatish karke hai, 14, 13 October ko deliver hua tha unko product.

Customer: Naam, naam kya hai naam?

Executive: Yatish.

Customer: Yatish?

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Ma'am, unhe to maine parcel laga diya tha unhe maine.

Executive: Haan?

Customer: Unhe to maine parcel laga diya tha ma'am maine unhe.

Executive: Haan, lekin unko defective product deliver ho gaya tha. To abhi unka problem resolve ho gaya hai kya?

Customer: Defective product, ye to khair mujhe nahi malum ma'am. Agar aisa tha to mujhe wo call karte, main use return mangata.

Executive: Achha, aapki baat nahi hui abhi tak?

Customer: Nahi, mere paas koi call nahi aayi ma'am.

Executive: Achha, theek hai sir, main dekh leti hu. Agar unka aisa kuch hai to fir main aapko number wagera share karti hu. Aap unse ek baar baat karke resolve kar lijiyega. Theek hai sir.

Customer: Baat, baat batao main kya baat karu ma'am batao. Jab aapke paas complaint kar di to aap hi ko solve karna chahiye ma'am ab ye to. Mere paas wo phone nahi karega, mere paas wo phone nahi karega. Aapko bata raha hai defective hai, aap ye to mujhse bata raha hai ki defective hai.

Executive: Nahi, unhone IndiaMART pe phone lagaya tha aur bataya tha ki unko ek product unhone order kiya tha keypad phone karke. 1400 kuch tha almost. To unko defective deliver hua hai. To fir aap unse ek baar baat karke unki jo bhi problem hai resolve kar lijiyega. Main ek...

Customer: Unka number, unka number, number bolo unka.

Executive: Haan haan, main WhatsApp pe share karti hu. Aur waise aap abhi services use kar rahe hain, toh buy leads wagera confirm karna proper aap.

Customer: Haan ma'am?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji bolo.

Executive: Buy leads aapke paas aa rahe hain kya? Last buy leads aapne kab confirm kiya tha?

Customer: Buy leads to kam sahi hai ma'am, koi dikkat nahi hai, sahi hai kaam. Buy leads ab sahi aa rahi hai, relevant aa rahi hai?

Customer: Haan ma'am, sahi aa rahi hai, koi dikkat nahi hai aapki dua se.

Executive: Okay okay. Abhi ek aapke location se buy lead aayi hui hai, please ek baar check kar lijiye aur usko confirm kar lijiye.

Customer: Achha buy lead kaun si?

Executive: Open kijiye IndiaMART ka.

Customer: IndiaMART maine open kar liya ma'am.

Executive: Haan. Aapne confirm bhi kiya hai, aaj bhi confirm kiya hai aapne. Ek minute location.

Customer: Filter lagaiye apne dukaan ka.

Executive: Nokia Asha 300.

Executive: Haan, ek hi piece kiya hai but wo Bijnor ka hi hai.

Customer: 21 tarikh ka time de diya ma'am unhe wire ko maine 21 tarikh ka, jab godam band rahega to 21 tarikh mein hi khulega.

Executive: Achha.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Aur theek hai, theek hai. Aur inse ek baar main number wagera share karungi, aap baat kar lijiyega. Baki abhi aap buy leads proper use kar rahe hain. Abhi to...

Customer: Ma'am, meri baat suno, meri baat suno. Aap meri baat suno, aapke paas complaint aayi hai na? To aap keh do ki us parcel ko aap deliver karo usi address pe lagwa do jo address pe aaya tha na usi address pe lagwa do. Hum balance hai uska return karwa denge bas khali itna keh do bas khali, koi dikkat nahi. Jab aapke paas complaint dali hai banda humse bhi to keh sakta hai ma'am ye wali baat.

Executive: Wo aapke keh sakte the but wo IndiaMART pe phone lagaya tha kyunki unhone purchase IndiaMART ko kiya tha na, aap unko nahi pata hoga ki haan seller kaun hai.

Customer: Nahi nahi, meri baat suno, purchase IndiaMART ko kara main mana nahi kar raha. Aap mujhse balance le lo, main aapko dal dunga, aap unhe dal dena. Keh do unse ke parcel unka wapsi lota do.

Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, main ek baar baat karti hu unse. Aur baki abhi IndiaMART se bhi November mein business mila hai na sir aapko?

Customer: Haan ma'am?

Executive: IndiaMART se bhi November mein business mila hai na sir aapko?

Customer: Haan, sahi hai ma'am, koi dikkat nahi hai, bahut achcha kaam hai IndiaMART se, bahut badhiya chal raha hai mera.

Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Aapki queries hogi, inquiries wagera. To please inquiries check kar lijiyega, inquiry wagera pe reply kar dijiyega. Inquiries wagera pe reply nahi karte to inquiries aani kam ho jati hai. To ek baar ek baar apni inquiry, inquiry ek baar check kijiye.

Customer: Inquiry maine check kar li ma'am, sahi hai, koi dikkat nahi.

Executive: Nahi sir, wo inquiries aayi thi but shayad aapne usse reply nahi kiya hai. Sir inquiries check kijiye aap usse lead manager mein.

Customer: Wo mera address mang raha hai na, main address bhej raha hu unhe apna.

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Main unhe ko apna address bhej raha hu, fir wo address milenge.

Executive: Hello. Aap unhe ye keh rahe hain. Sir, inquiries bahut saari aapko aayi hai, ek baar check kar lijiye usse reply kar dijiye.

Customer: Reply kar raha hu ma'am, main kab raha hu, reply kar raha hu sabhi ko. Lead manager se jaake aap check kijiyega. Main phone karke dekh lenge waha se aap reply kar dijiyega. Okay sir, theek hai sir, thank you.

Customer: Theek hai, okay ma'am, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a complaint about defective product.

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Executive says customer has not replied to inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive will share customer's number with complainant.

- Executive asked customer to check and confirm buyleads.

- Executive asked customer to reply to inquiries.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, defective product, complaint
